title: Banned For saying the N word in one game
body: 1. I just got a ban because i typed the N word cuz i was tilted. I mean ok give a chat ban or so, but no they give me 14 day suspention :c. Isn't this to harsh Riot?{{item:3070}}

This thread's a year old, dude.
What an idiotic child.

I'm on this guy's side with this. Someone can call someone else a cr#cker, ch#nk, f#ggot, whatever, and that's fine. Nobody gets banned for that unless it's excessive and prolonged. Call someone the n-word once and you've earned yourself a 14 day suspension? 

Give the guy a warning and then chat restrict him like everything else. What, do we think black people just can't handle it like everyone else can and does? It's not okay to make vulgar comments about anyone, that's a given, but to give one ethnic group privilege when it comes to controlling offensive language is undemocratic and inappropriate. If you do it for one group of people, do it for everyone; if you're going to have a system purposed for administering punishments, have them be uniform and just.

And no, don't 14 day suspend every account, Riot. Give warnings and drop honour levels.

The fact that we need to have this conversation at all is ridiculous.
